description: (n-1)st elementary symmetric function of binomial(n,0), binomial(n,1), ..., binomial(n,n).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..70
mathematica: a[n_] := SymmetricPolynomial[n-1, Table[Binomial[n, k], {k, 0, n}]]; a /@ Range[18] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Jul 12 2011 *)
author: _Clark Kimberling_
